price: Mose kaa sε: ”Me Wura Nyankopͻn, εnam adom a Wode adom me yi nti, memmoa abͻneεfoͻ no bio “.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā anʿamta ʿalayya falan akūna ẓahīran lil'muj'rimīna
